title: Video: The 1975 – A Change of Heart
body:
Having firmly cemented their place as one of the biggest bands in the world with their chart topping, genre bending second album, I Like it When You Sleep…, **The 1975** are currently taking the album to the live circuit.

New single and fans favourite, _A Change of Heart_ arrives with a self-referential video that fits succinctly into the ever growing history of the band, and featuring a stellar performance from lead singer Matthew Healy. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
